content:
Jo Peninsulas 11:36 AM
Hello Chin,

Thank you for your response, and I completely understand that your time and commitments are valuable. I appreciate your kind words and your support for our initiatives. If you happen to know anyone within your network who might be interested in learning more or getting involved, please feel free to share our information with them.

Wishing you all the best in your work and time with your family. Have a great day!

Best regards,
Jo
